name: @structured-world/gitlab-mcp
description: MCP server for using the GitLab API

mcp.name: GitLab MCP Server
mcp.description: Model Context Protocol server for GitLab API - 44 tools across 13 entity types with CQRS architecture, OAuth 2.1, and multiple transport modes
mcp.author: Dmitry Prudnikov

authentication.note: Server starts without token (tools/list works), but tool execution requires authentication

tools.name: browse_projects
tools.description: Find, list, or inspect GitLab projects.

tools.name: browse_namespaces
tools.description: Explore GitLab groups and user namespaces.

tools.name: browse_commits
tools.description: Explore repository commit history and diffs.

tools.name: browse_events
tools.description: Track GitLab activity and events.

tools.name: browse_users
tools.description: Find GitLab users with smart pattern detection.

tools.name: browse_todos
tools.description: View your GitLab todo queue (notifications requiring action).

tools.name: manage_project
tools.description: Create, update, or manage GitLab projects.

tools.name: manage_namespace
tools.description: Create, update, or delete GitLab groups/namespaces.

tools.name: manage_todos
tools.description: Manage your GitLab todo queue.

tools.name: manage_context
tools.description: View and manage runtime session configuration.

tools.name: browse_labels
tools.description: List and inspect project or group labels.

tools.name: manage_label
tools.description: Create, update, or delete project/group labels.

tools.name: browse_merge_requests
tools.description: Find and inspect merge requests.

tools.name: browse_mr_discussions
tools.description: Read discussion threads and draft review notes on merge requests.

tools.name: manage_merge_request
tools.description: Create, update, merge, or approve merge requests.

tools.name: manage_mr_discussion
tools.description: Post comments, start threads, and suggest code changes on merge requests.

tools.name: manage_draft_notes
tools.description: Create and manage unpublished review comments on merge requests.

tools.name: browse_files
tools.description: Explore project file structure and read source code.

tools.name: manage_files
tools.description: Create, update, or upload repository files.

tools.name: browse_milestones
tools.description: Track milestone progress with associated issues and MRs.

tools.name: manage_milestone
tools.description: Create, update, or delete project/group milestones.

tools.name: browse_pipelines
tools.description: Monitor CI/CD pipelines and read job logs.

tools.name: manage_pipeline
tools.description: Trigger, retry, or cancel CI/CD pipelines.

tools.name: manage_pipeline_job
tools.description: Control individual CI/CD jobs within a pipeline.

tools.name: browse_variables
tools.description: List and inspect CI/CD variables for projects or groups.

tools.name: manage_variable
tools.description: Create, update, or delete CI/CD variables with environment scoping.

tools.name: browse_wiki
tools.description: Read wiki pages in projects or groups.

tools.name: manage_wiki
tools.description: Create, update, or delete wiki pages.

tools.name: browse_work_items
tools.description: Find and inspect issues, epics, tasks, and other work items.

tools.name: manage_work_item
tools.description: Create, update, delete, or link work items (issues, epics, tasks).

tools.name: browse_snippets
tools.description: Find and read code snippets with versioning support.

tools.name: manage_snippet
tools.description: Create, update, or delete code snippets with multi-file support.

tools.name: browse_webhooks
tools.description: List and inspect webhook configurations for projects or groups.

tools.name: manage_webhook
tools.description: Create, update, delete, or test webhooks for event-driven automation.

tools.name: browse_integrations
tools.description: Discover active project integrations and their configuration.

tools.name: manage_integration
tools.description: Configure or disable project integrations (50+ supported).

tools.name: browse_releases
tools.description: View project releases and asset download links.

tools.name: manage_release
tools.description: Create, update, or delete project releases with asset management.

tools.name: browse_refs
tools.description: Inspect branches, tags, and their protection rules.

tools.name: manage_ref
tools.description: Create, delete, and protect branches and tags.

tools.name: browse_members
tools.description: View team members and access levels in projects or groups.

tools.name: manage_member
tools.description: Add, remove, or update access levels for project/group members.

tools.name: browse_search
tools.description: Search across GitLab resources globally or within a scope.

tools.name: browse_iterations
tools.description: View group iterations for agile sprint planning.

author: Dmitry Prudnikov <mail@polaz.com>

scripts.build: prisma generate && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && yarn build:copy-assets
scripts.test:help:
printf '# Test Scripts
  yarn test              - Unit tests only (fast, safe default)
  yarn test <pattern>    - Unit tests matching pattern
  yarn test:cov          - Unit test coverage
  yarn test:integration  - Integration tests (needs .env.test)
  yarn test:all          - Full suite (unit + integration)
  yarn test:env-gating   - Test environment gating
'
